title: Racial Equity in Online Science Learning Design: Short-Intensive Course Based on Hope and Empathy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge (middle school education level)
context.additional_context: Designed to ensure equitable learning opportunities in science for learners from diverse racial backgrounds, emphasizing smartphone-based accessibility and an environment respecting learners' cultural capital.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three criteria for evaluating science content that consider racial equity.
Learners can design at least one science inquiry question reflecting their cultural experiences.
Learners can practice inclusive communication methods in online learning communities based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
